response.overview: Continued: Please! Don't look! My Lost Item. Rather than a hardcore defecation scene, have you ever wanted to see the expression on a boy's face as he endures the pain of an enema, his brow furrowed as he cries, "My stomach hurts! His poop is stimulating his anus. It feels so good. In FN8: What should I do? My stomach is rumbling, it's just coming out! In FN9: Energetic drops are moving straight ahead! FN12's main model, Jun's poop, somehow, makes me feel itchy... Appearance in PG71: After an enema, the penis swells... and it bounces while still hard!
